name: Svenska Flygbranschen
goal:
The Swedish Aviation Industry Group, SFB, is a trade and employers' association whose members are airlines and other companies associated with the aviation industry.

The vision of the Association is to create a competitive environment for its members and contribute to sustainable development. SFB is associated with the Confederation of Swedish Enterprise. The Association is divided into two business areas, i.e., employer and trade issues. The number of member companies is approximately 100, with around 10,000 employees. Some 15 associated companies are also tied to SFB.
euInitiatives:
Airport package
EU 261/2004
EU ETS
EASA regulation
SES
Aviation market package
